name: Sabotage (itch) (Cameron_atkinson)
description:
-HOW TO PLAY-

Rearange Obstacles in the scene 

so that you can get through,

you have a short time to do this so

be fast. 

CLICK AND DRAG ITEMS TO MOVE  THEM, THEY WILL GAIN PHYSICS AFTER TIMER IS DONE

W,S,A,D TO MOVE

Press R at anytime to restart the level

Goodluck!

This is for the TriJam - Sabotage Game Jam
